title: Enabling On-Body Transmissions with Commodity Devices: Poster
abstract: In this poster, we show for the first time that commodity devices can be used to generate wireless data transmissions that are confined to the human body. Specifically, we show that commodity input devices such as fingerprint sensors and touchpads can be used to transmit information to only wireless receivers that are in contact with the body.
booktitle: Proceedings of the 22nd Annual International Conference on Mobile Computing and Networking
